```py
In [1]: df = pd.DataFrame({"A": [1, 2], "B": [True, False]})

In [2]: df.all(axis=None)
Out[2]: False 
```

```py
>>> # NumPy 1.15, pandas 0.23.1
>>> np.any(pd.DataFrame({"A": [False], "B": [False]}))
A    False
B    False
dtype: bool 
```

```py

In [2]: df.all(axis=None)
Out[2]: False 
```

```py
>>> # NumPy 1.15, pandas 0.23.1
